home.profile_alt: Photo of DJEGHABA MOHAMMED BAHA EDDINE
home.title: Network Engineer & Artificial Intelligence Specialist
home.description: Graduated in industrial network engineering and artificial intelligence, holding a Master's degree in telecommunications. Strong skills in IT systems, web development (MERN, Flutter), cybersecurity, and AI/IoT solutions. Passionate about digital innovation and high-performance distributed systems.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: Technologies and tools I utilize to build scalable and robust solutions:

about.paragraph1: As a skilled engineer specializing in industrial networks and artificial intelligence, I hold a Master's degree in telecommunications. I am passionate about leveraging technology and innovation to develop intelligent, scalable, and efficient systems tailored to modern industry needs.
about.paragraph2: Driven by emerging technologies and a commitment to continuous learning, I design smart full-stack solutions spanning IoT, AI, and cloud infrastructures using React, Node.js, Flutter, and MongoDB. Combining scientific rigor with technical expertise and strong teamwork skills, I actively seek new professional challenges where I can contribute effectively and grow.
